1. Employee registration and profile creation: Employees can register and create their profiles on the leave management system, including their personal and contact information, job title, and department.
2. Role-based access control: The system allows different levels of access based on the employee's role within the company. For example, managers and HR have more access than regular employees.
3. Self-service portal: Employees can view and manage their leave requests through a self-service portal, including submitting leave requests, viewing leave balances, and canceling or making changes to existing requests.
4. Online leave request submission: Employees can submit leave requests online, which are automatically routed to the appropriate manager or HR representative for approval or denial.
5. Automatic notifications: The system sends automatic notifications to managers and HR when a leave request is submitted, approved, or denied.
6. Approval workflows and routing: Leave requests are routed and approved based on company policies and the employee's role.
7. Leave balance tracking and notifications: The system tracks each employee's leave balance and sends notifications when an employee's balance is low.
8. Leave Types: The system supports different types of leave, including annual leave, sick leave, parental leave, bereavement leave, and other leave types as applicable.
9. Leave Policies: The system allows for company-wide leave policies, role-based policies, and custom policies for different departments or teams.
10. Reporting and Analytics: The system provides detailed reporting and analytics on leave requests, approvals, and denials, as well as leave utilization and balance reports for managers and HR.
11. Integration: The system can be integrated with existing HR systems, payroll and time tracking systems, and calendar and scheduling systems.
12. Security and Compliance: The system is compliant with relevant laws and regulations and includes data encryption and secure access controls.
13. Training and Support: The system includes user guides and tutorials, onboarding and training for employees and managers, and support from a dedicated team.
14. Time-off Management: The system allows management of all types of time off, including vacation, sick leave, personal days, and more.
15. Multi-language Support: The system supports multiple languages to accommodate a diverse workforce.
16. Mobile App Access: Employees can submit leave requests and view their leave balances through a mobile app.
17. Self-service Features: Employees can view their leave balances, upcoming requests, and past approvals/denials.
18. Advanced Reporting: Advanced reporting and analytics capabilities to give managers and HR better insight into the company's leave usage.
19. Workflow Automation: Automated workflows for leave requests, approvals, and denials.
20. Integration with other HR Systems: Integration with other HR systems, such as payroll and time tracking software.
